abstract: Lexus, the luxury division of Toyota, said V-6 and V-8 engines — the company did not identify the model years — might be defective because of “slight variations in the manufacturing process.”
snippet: Lexus, the luxury division of Toyota, said V-6 and V-8 engines — the company did not identify the model years — might be defective because of “slight variations in the manufacturing process.”
lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor said Friday that it was preparing a global recall of 270,000 cars, including luxury Lexus sedans, to fix an engine problem that could cause them to stall.

headline.print_headline: Toyota Prepares a Recall Of Up to 270,000 Vehicles

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LEXUS DIVISION OF TOYOTA MOTOR SALES USA
